original_text: And when he had gone over those parts, and had given them much exhortation, he came into Greece,
korean_text: 그 지방으로 다녀가며 여러 말로 제자들에게 권하고 헬라에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And when he had gone over those parts,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 지역들을 다 지나갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: and had given them much exhortation,
